LanguageData.ShowPlowOverlayToggleButton: Toggle overlay of soil plown status.
LanguageData.Terra_SettingsDynamicRiversDescription: Enable this if you want rivers to have dynamic water levels. For example floods after a big rain or low water during a drought in summer. Note that changing this mid game / for existing saves can result in weird behaviour.
LanguageData.Terra_SettingsDynamicOceansDescription: Enable this if you want oceans to have dynamic water levels, mainly tides. Note that changing this mid game / for existing saves can result in weird behaviour.
